DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate efficacy safety coadministered Irbesartan Atorvastatin patient hypertension hyperlipidemia .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Safety Irbesartan Atorvastatin Hypertension Hyperlipidemia
DOC.criteria: Aged 19 75 year Signed informed consent At screening , SPB ≥ 180mmHg DBP ≥ 110mmHg LDLC > 250mg/dL TG ≥ 400mg/dL Has history hypersensitivity Angiotensin Ⅱ receptor blocker HMGCoA reductase inhibitor component drug Has history multidrug allergy
